name: Nanit
0:
”Alexa, open Nanit.”
”Alexa, ask Nanit how Lilly's night was?”
”Alexa, ask Nanit to turn on Lilly's nightlight”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nanit
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To watch your baby’s crib with Alexa Show or Spot use the Nanit Show skill -> https://alexa.amazon.com/spa/index.html#skills/dp/B07V3MLQ87

Nanit is the only video monitor that puts your baby's sleep development right in your hands. And now, with our Amazon Alexa integration, you can go hands-free. You can ask Alexa how your baby slept, what time they woke up, or even how many times you took them out of the crib each night. 
If you want to watch your baby’s crib with the Alexa Show or Spot, use the Nanit Show skill instead - https://alexa.amazon.com/spa/index.html#skills/dp/B07V3MLQ87

To get started, enable the skill and link your Nanit account. In seconds, you'll be able to ask Alexa things like:

“Alexa, ask Nanit, how Lilly's night was?"
“Alexa, ask Nanit, what time did Lilly fall asleep last night?”
“Alexa, ask Nanit, when Lilly woke up?”
"Alexa, ask Nanit, how long did Lilly sleep last night?"
"Alexa, ask Nanit to turn on the lights in Lilly's room"

With Alexa, Nanit is smarter than ever, making it easier for you to understand your baby's night, so that baby - and the whole family - can get more sleep.

Visit www.nanit.com to learn more about Nanit and to download the Nanit app for iOS and Android.
